headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Mayor's Office--Monday. THE MAYOR AND THE CAB-DRIVERS HEALTH COMMISSIONERS.

docs.lead_paragraph: HEALTH COMMISSIONERS.- At a meeting of the Health Commissioners, in the Mayor's Office on Monday, the following communication was received from Dr. Thompson, Health Officer at Quarantine: To his Honor the Mayor and commissioner of Health, City of New-York;

docs.snippet: The completion of the contract for the extension of the Dom Pedro II. Railroad gives a new bold to your countrymen upon the internal improvement system of Brazil. In fact the prejudices against the Yankees is rapidly vanishing. Only a few years ago...

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICA.; Affairs at Rio--Yankees in the Ascendant--Politics--Buenos Ayres--The Declaration of that Government--The Argentine--Message of President Urquiza-Affairs at Montevideo--In Paraguay.

docs.abstract: Address of Urquiza - Decn. of B.A Govt.
docs.lead_paragraph: The completion of the contract for the extension of the Dom Pedro II. Railroad gives a new bold to your countrymen upon the internal improvement system of Brazil. In fact the prejudices against the Yankees is rapidly vanishing. Only a few years ago the Emperor, with all his enlightenment, shared in the vulgar prejudice.

headline.main: FROM MEXICO; Movements of the Constitutional Party in the North-A Railroad Through Chihuahua --Guadainjara Attached--The Action of Minister Forsyth--Case of Hardship from Following His Bad Advice--Now commercial Regulations in the Campeachy.

docs.lead_paragraph: The arrival of the steamer General Rusk, at New-Orleans, from Brazes Santiago, furnishes advices from Monterey to the 28th ult. VIDAURRI was to start for San Luis Potesi on the 10th inst., with 2,000 men, eight pieces of artillery and ammunition, and to take command of the Army of the North. ZUAZUA was leaving Zacatecas with about 4,000 to attack San Luis Potosi, and would not wait for the arrival at VIDAURRI.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Police Intelligence. Mayor's Office. Rariem Railroad Company.

docs.lead_paragraph: RUFFIANLY ASSAULT AND PROBABLE MURDER. -At 8 o'clock, Friday night, Rinaldo De Long, C. La Monx, and two other persons, were sitting on an old sled in Gansevoort street, when they were attacked by two ruffians--John Quinlan, alias " Corky Jack," and the notorious James Irvin. As Quinlan came up he shook his ist in De Long's face, who, resenting it, struck him a violent blow.

docs.snippet: HURRY TO THE COUNTRY--There were 111 deaths more last week than the week before in this City-making 553 in all. Of these 228 were in the cases of Cholera infantum--they being 167 last week against 49 of the week preceding. The fatal cases of...
docs.lead_paragraph: HURRY TO THE COUNTRY--There were 111 deaths more last week than the week before in this City-making 553 in all. Of these 228 were in the cases of Cholera infantum--they being 167 last week against 49 of the week preceding. The fatal cases of intantile conversion were 57, against 27 of the week before.

docs.snippet: At the meeting of the Commissioners, on Friday, the following communications were received: THE SHIP GROTTO. To the Mayor and Commissioners of the Board of Health: SIRS: The ship Grotto, from Sanua la Grande, came into port on the 5th inst.,...
docs.lead_paragraph: At the meeting of the Commissioners, on Friday, the following communications were received: THE SHIP GROTTO. To the Mayor and Commissioners of the Board of Health: SIRS: The ship Grotto, from Sanua la Grande, came into port on the 5th inst., reporting having lost several persons with yellow fever on the passage, and with nearly all hands on board sick or disaoied from the same disease.

docs.snippet: KEEP OFF.---The Castleton Board of Health, at their last meeting, adopted resolutions forbidding all persons working on any infected vessel. or on any vessel detained at Quarantine by the Health Officer, to come within the Quarantine inclosure during...
docs.lead_paragraph: KEEP OFF.---The Castleton Board of Health, at their last meeting, adopted resolutions forbidding all persons working on any infected vessel. or on any vessel detained at Quarantine by the Health Officer, to come within the Quarantine inclosure during the time they continue at such work or for five days after; also,
